title: NLFS Cy Young RPPC + C.1948 Team Issue PC Paige Auto RC Cleveland
author: yanksfan09

posts.post_title: NLFS Cy Young RPPC + C.1948 Team Issue PC Paige Auto RC Cleveland
posts.post_content:
NLFS
C. 1950 Real Photo Postcard Cy Young with Dog. Just like the 1947 Birthday Postcards. I've owned two of those, this is the nicest I've seen. It may be a 1947 image like the birthday ones with dogs but this is a KODAK back so guessing C. 1950. Pencil Writing on back. Really incredible image quality, glossy photo postcard! Some light wrinkling, displays beautifully. 


Satchel Paige signed rookie Postcard: Consigned to Sterling
reduction, looking to find Satch a new home!
New postcard added, Cy Young with dog
